channel.title: Can someone please help me portforward my 562?
channel.description:
hey mopar, i am useing a 562 client and source witch is Project dungeonfest 562 source and lummyscape 562 client.
-Friends Client i have changed the ip in applet_sub1 from 127.0.0.1 - (my ip) and i also changed the ip in clientsettings.java from 0.0.0.0 - (my iP)
-My Client i have changed the ip in applet_sub1 from 127.0.0.1 - (my ip) but i have kept the 0.0.0.0 the same so that i can login coz when i change it to my ip i cant login.
any help? been trying to get this to work for about 3 days now thanks

item.title: Can someone please help me portforward my 562?
item.dc:creator: @562-Pro 562-Pro
item.description:
@562-Pro wrote:

hey mopar, i am useing a 562 client and source witch is Project dungeonfest 562 source
and lummyscape 562 client.

-Friends Client
i have changed the ip in applet_sub1 from 127.0.0.1 - (my ip)
and i also changed the ip in clientsettings.java from 0.0.0.0 - (my iP)

-My Client
i have changed the ip in applet_sub1 from 127.0.0.1 - (my ip)
but i have kept the 0.0.0.0 the same so that i can login coz when i change it to
my ip i cant login.

any help? been trying to get this to work for about 3 days now
thanks
